segments.text: Good morning everyone . Thank you for attending the meeting today . I'm sure you all have a copy of the agenda . So let's get started with the first issue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're here today to present to you the results of our marketing research regarding the consumer behavior .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to begin by introducing our foreign guests to our stuff on your left ( right ) , we have Mr . Brown , who is Vice President of Sales . Next to him is Ms . Arts , Director of Marketing for the Atlas Company . In the back row is Dr . Barolo , who is visiting from Italy . Thank you all for coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad to see everyone is here and on time . Let's get started ! Susan , toss out some of your ideas .
segments.speaker: S2
